title.narrative: PROCOFSERVICES and P0053 for Orissa Health Sector Nutrition Programme

description.narrative: This activity (PROCOFSERVICES and P0053 for Orissa Health Sector Nutrition Programme) is a component of Orissa Health Sector Nutrition Programme (OHSNP) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £11,250,042. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Basic nutrition, Malaria control, Health personnel development, Reproductive health care, Basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation. , with the following implementing partners: Options Consultancy Services, PwC. The start date is 02-04-2007 and the end date is 30-03-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation
